title: Wallflower Wanted
description: I'm a walking contradiction. A mob princess and a wallflower.Nobody notices me.Except him.Iversen Nox is a soldier in the Nordic Mafia and my very opposite.He's brutal, unapologetic and he doesn't apologize for wanting me.And now a meek thing like me has power...Over a pitiless mobster.
author: Ever Lilac
